extendedInfo.description: An arcade style 3D tunnel racer with a twist in the plot!The FULL Version (all 12 levels) is available in Paid Games on Google Play for only Â£0.99!In BloodRunner, you play a futuristic miniaturized criminal agent. Over 12 beautiful levels you will explore the human body, control the target host and find your escape!  Clive, from "the agency", will be your advisor and sole link to the outside world.Race against the clock using onscreen touch joypad or device tilt (accelerometer) controls!You wonât be racing in an apocalyptic or futuristic city. No, thatâs for amateurs! - TalkAndroid.com ReviewThis is the DEMO version (first four levels).Search Google Play for BloodRunner FULL to finish the journey (all twelve levels).Your journey will take you through the blood system, inside a cell nucleus, back out and around the heart, the eyes, the brain, the inner ear, the lungs, and more!  Add in a plot with a few twists and turns, and you're in for one great adventure!  You'll need sharp reactions to avoid the dangers lurking in the body, and time will always be a pressure!

reviews.title: There\'s always a \"but\".
reviews.comment: This game is awesome and all but, sadly, it\'s lagging and the controls aren\'t functioning well. Please fix that for a 5-Star rating!
reviews.author: Fredrick Sylar

reviews.title: No good on HTC Droid Incredible 2
reviews.author: Jim Cid

reviews.title: Bloodrunner best app ever
reviews.comment: Brilliant graphic - extremely responsive and imaginative  who would have thought you would end up inside the wife of the president of the USA surprises galore !!!!
reviews.author: Dennis Rigg
